scripts.upload: echo 'Upload functionality requires Whop CLI - use manual upload'
scripts.upload:android: echo 'Upload functionality requires Whop CLI - use manual upload'
scripts.upload:ios: echo 'Upload functionality requires Whop CLI - use manual upload'
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && echo '✅ Build directory cleaned'
scripts.ship: npm run build && echo '✅ App built successfully! Ready for manual upload to Whop'
scripts.ship:android: npm run build:android && echo '✅ Android app built successfully! Ready for manual upload to Whop'
scripts.ship:ios: npm run build:ios && echo '✅ iOS app built successfully! Ready for manual upload to Whop'
scripts.dev: npm run build && echo '✅ App built successfully! To test locally, you need to install it into your Whop app and use the Whop mobile app.'
scripts.dev:android: npm run build:android && echo '✅ Android app built successfully!'
scripts.dev:ios: npm run build:ios && echo '✅ iOS app built successfully!'
